incidents.name: SMS Failures to Greece Cosmote

incident_updates.body: Twilio SMS was degraded for 72 hours between 03/09/2024 and 03/11/2024. During this time, customers may have experienced SMS failures to Greece Cosmote with error codes 21703 and 21612. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: MMS Delays and Failures

incident_updates.body: Twilio Programmable Messaging was degraded approximately between 8 and 10 minutes, the delay started around 07:00 AM Pacific Time on 03/07/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced delays and failures on MMS. The issue has now been resolved.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue Messaging delays. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Automated Alert: Minimal Customer Impact
